dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification www.plasmaconcepts.com /Samsung Television
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Notifications [mailto:Notifications@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 2:52 PM
To: Response, Legal; Copyright; Abuse
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification www.plasmaconcepts.com /Samsung Television

 

 

 



 

 

 

6/1/2007

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services Inc.

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas TX 75207

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

Dear Designated Agent:

This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
